Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"

Razor Claw had become numb from the pain as his transformation continued, h=
e lay on the ground trying to catch his breath. He stood up in what appeare=
d to be the form of a raptor with a robots head. he forced himself to his f=
eet looking at the shocked bots around him. (Dachandes characters) he remem=
bered lashing out and knew that he was in the middle of something he'd star=
ted but couldn't finish. He tried to transform to full robot mode but was m=
et with a surprise. Instead of a robot a wolverine stood staring in disbeli=
ef at the surroundings. The former raptor was lost in confusion trying to m=
ake sense of what had just transpired. obviously the virus had adapted the =
wolverine DNA with his own, the result was that he had lost his dinobot lik=
e robot mode.

"So, what now?" he asked knowing that he'd pissed off four b=
ots that were still at practically full strength while he had used most of =
his strength fighting the virus.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Al=
loran2@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, March 02, 200=
1 9:34 PM
  Subject: Need Shelter


  :::Time Warp::: 

  Time Warp: I dont=
 know myself, brother. But i do know that im tired of all 
  this rambling =
and need a rest. Which is why we need a shelter for tonight. 
  Where do yo=
u think we can find one? 
        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
